children.name: overlaps
children.description: Tests if the given extent overlaps with this instance.

children.name: toArray
children.description: Returns the four extreme locations of the extent as an array.

children.name: edges
children.description: Returns the four extreme locations of the extent.

children.name: includeAll

parameters.name: locations `Array`
parameters.description: The locations to include in the extent.

children.description: Grows the extent, if required, to contain all specified locations.

children.name: include

parameters.name: location `kendo.dataviz.map.Location`
parameters.description: The location to include in the extent.

children.description: Grows the extent, if required, to contain the specified location.

children.name: center
children.description: Returns the center of the extent.

children.name: containsAny

parameters.name: locations `Array`
parameters.description: An array of [locations](location) to test for.

children.description: Tests if any of the locations is contained within the extent.

children.name: contains
children.description: Tests if a location is contained within the extent.
